questions.question: 1. What is the rank of the parity check matrix of a $\mathbf{(8,5)}$ linear code?
2. For an $\mathbf{(n,k)}$ code with minimum distance $\mathbf{d}$, what is the maximum number of errors which can be detected?

3. Consider the generator matrix of an $\mathbf{(n,k)}$ code over $\mathbb{F}_2$ in systematic form given by $\begin{bmatrix} \underbrace{I}_{k \times k} | \underbrace{P}_{k \times (n-k)} \end{bmatrix}$, then what is the partiy check matrix of this code?

4. Let $\mathbf{w_{\min}}$ denote the minimum Hamming weight of a non-zero codeword in a linear block code $\mathcal{C}$ and let $\mathbf{d_{\min}}$ denote the minimum distance of the code. Which of the following is true?
5. What is the minimum distance of a single parity check code with block length 7 and dimension 6?
